abstract: In December TV Decoder noted that Telemundo introduced a new late-night talk show, “Mas Vale Tarde con Alex Cambert.” In Sunday’s New York Times, Marc Weingarten notes that it is a “radical experiment” for Spanish-language television, and finds some encouraging signs for the show:
lead_paragraph: In December TV Decoder noted that Telemundo introduced a new late-night talk show, “Mas Vale Tarde con Alex Cambert.” In Sunday’s New York Times, Marc Weingarten notes that it is a “radical experiment” for Spanish-language television, and finds some encouraging signs for the show:

headline.main: Positive Signs For Spanish-Language ‘Mas Vale Tarde’
